ICD_11_ICD_10_COVID19_Disease (http://worldhealthorganization.github.io/ddcc/ConceptMap/WHO_DDCC_Map_ICD11_to_ICD10_Disease_Targeted)

Mapping from http://id.who.int/icd11/mms to http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/icd-10

DRAFT (not intended for production usage). Published on 2021-04-23 by WHO (WHO: http://who.int).

Rule-based mappings between ICD-11 and ICD-10 for COVID-19 Disease or Agent Targeted


Group 1Mapping from DDCC Codes for ICD11 to ICD-10

Source CodeRelationshipTarget Code
RA01 (COVID-19 Disease)is equivalent toU07.1 (COVID-19, virus identified)
